channel.title: Varun Kumar
channel.description: A blog created with Next.js and Tailwind.css

item.title: PostgreSQL Joins
item.description: In this tutorial, you will learn about various kinds of PostgreSQL joins including inner join, left join, right join, and full outer join.
item.author: varun-kumar@live.com (Varun Kumar)

item.title: How to use PostgreSQL with Django
item.description: In this article, I will show you how to connect and use Postgres with Django a popular web framework for python.
item.author: varun-kumar@live.com (Varun Kumar)

item.title: How to install PostgreSQL on Ubuntu
item.description: In this article, I will show you how to install and use Postgres on Ubuntu 20.04.
item.author: varun-kumar@live.com (Varun Kumar)
